card.name: SBI Card ELITE
card.description: Premium lifestyle credit card offering exclusive privileges including welcome gift, reward points, complimentary movie tickets, lounge access, and concierge services.
card.target_audience: Individuals seeking premium lifestyle benefits and rewards on credit card spends.

categories.name: Dining, Departmental Stores & Grocery
categories.description: Earn 10 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 spent on Dining, Departmental Stores and Grocery.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Reward Points on accelerated categories are subject to a monthly cap of 10,000 points. After reaching the cap, earn 2 Reward Points per Rs. 100.
categories.how_to_earn: Use SBI Card ELITE for spends in specified categories.
categories.exclusions: Purchases at petrol pumps/service stations excluded (MCCs 5172, 5541, 5542, 5983).

categories.name: All other spends except fuel
categories.description: Earn 2 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 spent on all other spends except fuel.
categories.how_to_earn: Use SBI Card ELITE for spends outside accelerated categories.

bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Bonus Reward Points credited on achieving annual spends milestones.
Bonus Reward Points credited on achieving annual spends milestones.
Bonus Reward Points credited on achieving annual spends milestones.
Bonus Reward Points credited on achieving annual spends milestones.

redemption.process: Redeem points via SBI Card rewards portal or as per program guidelines.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Points can be redeemed for gifts, vouchers, or to pay card outstanding.

benefits.name: Welcome e-Gift Voucher
benefits.description: Welcome e-Gift Voucher worth Rs. 5,000 from travel and lifestyle brands.
benefits.how_to_avail: Receive SMS within 30 days of annual fee payment to choose voucher. Redeem via code at brand stores or online.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid for 6 months from receipt. No extension or replacement allowed.
benefits.eligibility: Eligible on payment of annual fee and account in good standing.

benefits.name: Complimentary Movie Tickets
benefits.description: Free movie tickets worth Rs. 6,000 every year.
benefits.how_to_avail: Valid for at least 2 tickets per booking per month on primary cards only.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Maximum discount Rs. 250/ticket for 2 tickets only. Convenience fee applicable.

benefits.name: International Lounge Program
benefits.description: Complimentary Priority Pass membership with 6 complimentary airport lounge visits per calendar year outside India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Request Priority Pass via SBI helpline or website. Valid for 2 years.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Only primary cardholders eligible. Usage fee applies after complimentary visits.
benefits.usage_limit: 6 visits per year, max 2 per quarter

benefits.name: Domestic Lounge Program
benefits.description: 2 complimentary domestic airport lounge visits every quarter in India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SBI Card ELITE at respective lounges.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid for limited period and subject to lounge availability.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 500 to Rs. 4,000 at petrol pumps.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SBI Card ELITE for fuel purchase within specified range.
benefits.value: Max waiver Rs. 250 per statement cycle
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Government service tax extra as applicable.

benefits.name: Fraud Liability Cover
benefits.description: Complimentary credit card fraud liability cover of Rs. 1 lakh.
benefits.how_to_avail: Report loss immediately to SBI Card helpline.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Coverage from 48 hours prior to reporting loss till 7 days post reporting.

benefits.name: Exclusive Concierge Service
benefits.description: Dedicated assistance for flower delivery, gift delivery, online doctor consultation.

current_offers.title: Welcome Gift
current_offers.description: Welcome e-Gift Voucher worth Rs. 5,000 on joining.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Voucher redemption within 6 months only. No extension or replacement.
current_offers.how_to_activate: Pay annual fee and respond to SMS to select voucher.

current_offers.title: Complimentary Movie Tickets
current_offers.description: Free movie tickets worth Rs. 6,000 every year.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Valid for primary cards only. Convenience fee applicable.
current_offers.exclusions: Max 2 tickets per booking per month.

perks.name: Contactless Payment
perks.description: Visa payWave/MasterCard Contactless for fast, secure transactions up to Rs. 5,000 without PIN.
perks.how_to_use: Wave card within 4 cm of contactless reader.

perks.name: Cash Access
perks.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million Visa/Mastercard/Amex ATMs worldwide.
perks.how_to_use: Use card at ATMs with PIN.

partnerships.benefit: Discount on movie tickets up to Rs. 500 per booking.
partnerships.how_to_avail: Book tickets on www.bookmyshow.com using SBI Card ELITE and apply offer.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Max 2 tickets per booking per month. Convenience fee applicable.

partnerships.benefit: Complimentary membership with 6 international lounge visits per year.
partnerships.how_to_avail: Request via SBI helpline or website.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Primary cardholders only. Usage fee applies after complimentary visits.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Reversal on spends of Rs. 10 Lakhs
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBI Card.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Spend based reversal on spends of Rs. 10 Lakhs
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBI Card.
